about_the_game:
Join the Supa Buddies on an epic adventure in the Dog Man: Mission Impawsible Demo!

Dive into this action-packed, humor-filled adventure. The key to the city has fallen into the hands of a supa bad guy, unlocking all the prison doors and releasing many evildoers. Help Dog Man and his friends chase down the supa bad guys in their most impawsible mission yet!

Game Features:

  • 2 Exciting Levels: Explore iconic locations from the Dog Man universe, including the Giant Marshmallow Factory and the Police Station. Each location offers platforming and puzzle-solving challenges.
  • Teamwork: Switch between Dog Man and his Supa Buddies, each with their own special abilities, to overcome obstacles and defeat bosses.

    • Dog Man: Digs underground and glides through the air.
    • Li’l Petey: Hacks gadgets and fits into small spaces.
    • 80-HD: Pushes heavy objects and jumps long distances.

  • Fun Gadgets: Unlock new gadgets and abilities as you progress, like a grappling hook, rocket shoes and power gloves to navigate through the levels.
  • Humor and Action: Enjoy funny dialogue, amusing interactions, and non-stop action that keeps you engaged in Dog Man’s world.
  • Art Style: Great animations inspired by the books, with comic-style sound effects that add a fun, cartoonish touch to the action.

Join the Supa Buddies on an epic adventure in the Dog Man: Mission Impawsible Demo!

Dive into this action-packed, humor-filled adventure. The key to the city has fallen into the hands of a supa bad guy, unlocking all the prison doors and releasing many evildoers. Help Dog Man and his friends chase down the supa bad guys in their most impawsible mission yet!

  • Teamwork: Switch between Dog Man and his Supa Buddies, each with their own special abilities, to overcome obstacles and defeat bosses.

  • Fun Gadgets: Unlock new gadgets and abilities as you progress, like a grappling hook, rocket shoes and power gloves to navigate through the levels.
  • Humor and Action: Enjoy funny dialogue, amusing interactions, and non-stop action that keeps you engaged in Dog Man’s world.

name: Dog Man: Mission Impawsible Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5257U, AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050, AMD RX 460 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5257U, AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050, AMD RX 460 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

short_description: Join the Supa Buddies on an epic adventure and help chase down the bad guys in the Dog Man: Mission Impawsible Demo!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America
